name: Hummus with a Kick
author: Muthanna Yacoub
summary: A little cayenne for a twist, and just enough turmeric for the color but not enough to dominate the flavor of this hummus variation. A slightly chunky consistency is okay. Garnish with fresh parsley and a drizzle of olive oil.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Add chickpeas to a small saucepan; bring to a boil
Cook until peas are soft and can be crushed with a spoon, about 10 minutes
Add tahini, oil, garlic salt, onion powder, turmeric, allspice, cayenne pepper, paprika, salt, and pepper to the blender
Cover and hold lid down with a potholder; blend on high until mostly smooth, but still thick, 1 to 2 minutes
